param.name: office
param.label: Выберите учреждение
param.query: SELECT id AS value, name as office FROM #__ttfsp_sprsect WHERE published=1 ORDER BY ordering

param.name: sid
param.label: Выберите специализацию
param.query: SELECT id AS value, name as sid FROM #__ttfsp_sprspec WHERE published=1 ORDER BY ordering
